description: Orochimaru is a major antagonist of Naruto series. He is a missing ninja from http://anidb.net/ch8864 [Konohagakure], who is recognised as one of the most powerful ninjas and known as one of the "Legendary Sannin" (Legendary Three Ninja), which was a title that was given to him and his former team mates, http://anidb.net/ch7213 [Jiraiya] and http://anidb.net/ch8606 [Tsunade], by Hanzou during the Second Shinobi World War. His main goals are to capture http://anidb.net/ch7196 [Uchiha Sasuke] as his new body to gain possession of the Sharingan and to destroy Konoha.
name: Orochimaru
